comment:
* Helper class used to guide the camera framework when * initializing the internal camera capture session. * It contains all required internal outputs, parameters, * modes and settings. * *

Extension must decide the final set of output surfaces * and pass an instance of ExtensionConfiguration as part * of the result during calls to {@link SessionProcessor#initSession}.

* * @hide

methods.name: public void setColorSpace(int colorSpace)
methods.comment:
* Set the color space using the ordinal value of a
     * {@link android.graphics.ColorSpace.Named}.
     * The default will be -1, indicating an unspecified ColorSpace,
     * unless explicitly set using this method.
